summary: This mod aim to make Hunter RP in Skyrim better.
descriptionHtml:
This mod contains 2 new weapons, \"Loner sword\" and \"Skinning knife\". Adds new retextured weapon \"Loner bow\", based on original skyrim\'s \"Hunting bow\", and brand new \"Hunting arrows\" with new quiver mesh( blanket and axe attached to quiver + quiver is bit moved to better fit on character\'s back and no clipping with bow ). Also adds new fort near Rift( future base of Hunting guild ), where players can buy Hunting arrows from new NPC named Reghelm.


Installation:

To install mod, unpack archive into your Skyrim\\Data folder and enable in Launcher.

Author: mirecc
author: mirecc
